text: avarkalukku (markka visayattil) telivana katatalaikalaiyum kotuttom; eninum avarkalukkitaiye untana poramaiyinal, avarkalukku (veta) nanam vantapinnarum avarkal apippiraya petam kontarkal; niccayamaka um iraivan avarkal etil apippiraya petam kontiruntarkalo atil kiyama nalil avarkalitaiye tirppuc ceyvan
